TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridViewRowContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很有用，當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或它所包含的值。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 當您處理事件，您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示每次使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵的資料列。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 您可以使用屬性來判斷、 包含的值或資料列的狀態，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定資料列多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，處理事件，以提供根據員工的職稱。In the following code example, the event is handled to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此範例中，兩個有兩個快顯功能表，一個針對管理員，一個用於所有其他員工。In this example, two there are two context menus, one for managers and one for all other employees. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#10)]
